title: Gardens help towns and cities beat countryside for tree cover

title: ‘I hugged the man who murdered my father’

description: The WW2 veteran has been painting scenes from his old sketchbooks during the pandemic.

title: Meet Merck Mercuriadis, the man who has spent $1bn on old hits
description: The Church is among the investors in a company that has been snapping up the rights to classic songs.
